alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Gulf; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 04 at 4:34PM EDT until June 04 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Gulf County in the Panhandle of Florida... Southwestern Calhoun County in the Panhandle of Florida... Southwestern Liberty County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 515 PM EDT/415 PM CDT/. * At 434 PM EDT/334 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles northeast of Stonemill Creek, or 16 miles south of Blountstown, moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Stonemill Creek, Orange, Wewahitchka, Honeyville, Kern, Wilma, Lewis, Chipola Cutoff, Chipola Park and Red Hill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
